feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX8][Network maintenance] Resilience upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 20, 03:00 - 05:00 UTC

Apr 6, 22:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 20/04/2022 03:00 UTC
End time : 20/04/2022 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Following our network infrastructure improvement process, we're upgrading our bandwidth resilience capacity.

entry.title: [Global][Hosted private cloud] - Maintenance upgrade host - wave 10
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 19, 05:00 UTC  -  Apr 22, 15:00 UTC

Apr 5, 22:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/04/2022 05:00 UTC
End time : 22/04/2022 15:00 UTC
Description : If you are from wave 10 you will receive a mail from us and you will be able to schedule again with the manager.
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Virtual machines will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If we meet an issue during the reboot of the host , it will be replaced. (20 min)

If major update have to be done, it will be two successive reboots like this:

Host v6.0 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.5 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.7 : upgrade minor to the last build 19195723 if needed, reboot.

If hosts are already on build 19195723, they will be skipped.
Service impact : None
Service improvement : All hosts have to be upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility and also due to the CVE.

entry.title: [RBX2A][Hosted private cloud] - Tete-58
entry.content:
Apr 6, 02:43 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/04/2022 02:07 UTC
End Time : 06/04/2022 02:30 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2a
Root cause : The fault came from the server, it did not mount the disk.

The problem has been solved.

Apr 6, 02:20 UTC
Investigating - Please note the incident on Tete-58

Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 06/04/2022 02:07 UTC
User impact : The datastore pcc-001638 is unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2a
Comment : The fault has reappeared. Our teams are currently identifying the source of the problem.

Thank you for your understanding

OVHcloud Technical team

entry.title: [RBX2A][Hosted private cloud] - Tete-58
entry.content:
Apr 6, 01:45 UTC
Resolved - Please note the incident on Tete-58

Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 06/04/2022 01:25 UTC
End time: 06/04/2022 01:42 UTC
User impact : The datastore pcc-001638 was unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2a
Root cause : The incident was due to a faulty disc.
Comment : The disc has been changed. The incident is over.

Thank you for your understanding

OVHcloud Technical team

entry.title: [RBX2a][VMware Private Cloud - Storage] - tete-3010
entry.content:
Apr 5, 13:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/04/2022 12:55UTC
End Time : 05/04/2022 13:02 UTC
Service impact : 2 datastores were impacted :pcc-002200 and pcc-005320
Root cause : It was caused by an hardware issue, a hard disk. It has been isolated. Service is working as expected at this time.
